text: Maggie Celine Louise De Block (born 28 April 1962) is a Belgian politician. She is a member of the Flemish liberal party Open Vld. She is the Minister of Social Affairs and Health since 2014 serving under the Charles Michel government. Critics have said that she does not set the right example as Health Minister due to her obesity and contracting type two diabetes, and she has answered that "I know I'm not a model but you have to see what's inside, not the packaging." ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Belgium Category:Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten politicians Category:People from Flemish Brabant
title: Maggie De Block
